00017 // every size is calculated of the suns size
00018 const double sun_size = 1.0;
00019 const double sun_slices_ratio = 20.0;
00020 const double sun_stacks_ratio = 16.0;
00021 const double sun_slices =  ceil ( sun_size * sun_slices_ratio );
00022 const double sun_stacks = ceil( sun_size * sun_stacks_ratio );
00023 const double planet_slices_ratio = 10.0;
00024 const double planet_stacks_ratio = 8.0;
00025 const double planet_slices =  ceil ( sun_size * planet_slices_ratio );
00026 const double planet_stacks = ceil( sun_size * planet_stacks_ratio );
00027 
00028 //mercury ratios
00029 const double mercury_size_ratio = 0.05;
00030 const double mercury_distance_ratio = 0.80;
00031 
00032 // mercury sizes
00033 const double mercury_size = mercury_size_ratio * sun_size;
00034 const double mercury_distance = mercury_distance_ratio * sun_size;
00035 
00036 // venus ratios
00037 const double venus_size_ratio = 0.1;
00038 const double venus_distance_ratio = 1.60;
00039 
00040 // venus sizes
00041 const double venus_size = venus_size_ratio * sun_size;
00042 const double venus_distance = venus_distance_ratio * sun_size;
00043 
00044 // earth ratios
00045 const double earth_size_ratio = 0.1;
00046 const double earth_distance_ratio = 2.20;
00047 
00048 //earth sizes
00049 const double earth_size = sun_size * earth_size_ratio;
00050 const double earth_distance = sun_size * earth_distance_ratio;
00051 
00052 // mars ratios
00053 const double mars_size_ratio = 0.05;
00054 const double mars_distance_ratio = 3.20;
00055 
00056 //mars sizes
00057 const double mars_size = sun_size * mars_size_ratio;
00058 const double mars_distance = sun_size * mars_distance_ratio;
00059 
00060

00063 const double jupiter_size_ratio = 0.5;
00064 const double jupiter_distance_ratio = 11.00;
00065 
00066 //jupiter sizes
00067 const double jupiter_size = sun_size * jupiter_size_ratio;
00068 const double jupiter_distance = sun_size * jupiter_distance_ratio;
00069 
00070 // saturn ratios
00071 const double saturn_size_ratio = 0.5;
00072 const double saturn_distance_ratio = 20.40;
00073 
00074 //staurn sizes
00075 const double saturn_size = sun_size * saturn_size_ratio;
00076 const double saturn_distance = sun_size * saturn_distance_ratio;

00097

00099 const double pluto_size = sun_size * pluto_size_ratio;
00100 const double pluto_distance = sun_size * pluto_distance_ratio;
00101 
00102 // scene ratios
00103 const double scene_size_ratio = 125.0;

00106 
00107 
00108 // scene size
00109 const double scene_size = sun_size * scene_size_ratio;

00117 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00118 {
00119         using namespace boost;
00120         shared_ptr< SceneGraph > graph( new SceneGraph );
00121         GraphRenderer graphRenderer(argc, argv, scene_size, graph );
00122         GlutTimer timer(100);
00123         
00124         typedef shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > node_ptr;
00125 
00126 
00131         /*
00132         typedef shared_ptr< RotationAnimationNode > ra_node_ptr;
00133         
00134         node_ptr earthAnimationBase( new RotationAnimationNode( 5.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, "Earth Animation" ) );
00135         ra_node_ptr earthAnimationDerived 
00136                 = shared_dynamic_cast< RotationAnimationNode > ( earthAnimationBase );
00137         timer.time_signal_->connect( boost::bind(&RotationAnimationNode::update, earthAnimationDerived) );
00138         */
00139 
00140         // solarSystem
00141         node_ptr solarSystem( new GroupNode( "SolarSystem" ) );
00142 
00143         // sun
00144         node_ptr sunTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\sun.bmp", "SunTexture" ) );
00145         node_ptr sun( new SolidSphereNode(sun_size, sun_slices, sun_stacks, 255, 255, 0, 0, "Sun") );
00146 
00147         // mercury 
00148         node_ptr mercuryTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\mercury.bmp", "MercuryTexture" ) );
00149         node_ptr translateMercury( new TranslationNode(mercury_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateMercury" ) );
00150         node_ptr mercury( new SolidSphereNode( mercury_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Mercury" ) );
00151 
00152         // venus
00153         node_ptr venusTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\venus.bmp", "VenusTexture" ) );
00154         node_ptr translateVenus( new TranslationNode(venus_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateVenus" ) );
00155         node_ptr venus( new SolidSphereNode( venus_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Venus" ) );
00156 
00157         // earth
00158         node_ptr earthTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\earth.bmp", "EarthTexture" ) );
00159         node_ptr earth( new SolidSphereNode( earth_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Earth" ) );
00160         node_ptr translateEarth( new TranslationNode(earth_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateEarth" ) );
00161 
00162         // mars
00163         node_ptr marsTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\mars.bmp", "MarsTexture" ) );
00164         node_ptr mars( new SolidSphereNode( mars_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Mars" ) );
00165         node_ptr translateMars( new TranslationNode(mars_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateMars" ) );
00166         
00167         // jupiter
00168         node_ptr jupiterTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\jupiter.bmp", "JupiterTexture" ) );
00169         node_ptr jupiter( new SolidSphereNode( jupiter_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Jupiter" ) );
00170         node_ptr translateJupiter( new TranslationNode(jupiter_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateJupiter" ) );
00171 
00172         // saturn
00173         node_ptr saturnTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\saturn.bmp", "SaturnTexture" ) );
00174         node_ptr saturn( new SolidSphereNode( saturn_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Saturn" ) );
00175         node_ptr translateSaturn( new TranslationNode(saturn_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateSaturn" ) );
00176 
00177         // uranus
00178         node_ptr uranusTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\uranus.bmp", "UranusTexture" ) );
00179         node_ptr uranus( new SolidSphereNode( uranus_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Uranus" ) );
00180         node_ptr translateUranus( new TranslationNode(uranus_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateUranus" ) );
00181 
00182         // neptune
00183         node_ptr neptuneTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\neptune.bmp", "NeptuneTexture" ) );
00184         node_ptr neptune( new SolidSphereNode( neptune_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Neptune" ) );
00185         node_ptr translateNeptune( new TranslationNode(neptune_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslateNeptune" ) );
00186 
00187         // pluto
00188         node_ptr plutoTexture( new TextureNode( ".\\textures\\pluto.bmp", "PlutoTexture" ) );
00189         node_ptr pluto( new SolidSphereNode( pluto_size, planet_slices, planet_stacks, 255, 255, 255, 0, "Pluto" ) );
00190         node_ptr translatePluto( new TranslationNode(neptune_distance, 0.0, 0.0, "TranslatePluto" ) );
00191 
00192 
00193         // solarSystem
00194         graph->addRootNode( solarSystem );
00195 
00196         // sun
00197         graph->addNode( solarSystem, sunTexture );
00198         graph->addNode( sunTexture, sun );
00199 
00200         // mercury
00201         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateMercury );
00202         graph->addNode( translateMercury, mercuryTexture );
00203         graph->addNode( mercuryTexture, mercury );
00204         
00205         // venus 
00206         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateVenus );
00207         graph->addNode( translateVenus, venusTexture );
00208         graph->addNode( venusTexture, venus );
00209 
00210         // earth
00211         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateEarth );
00212         graph->addNode( translateEarth, earthTexture );
00213         graph->addNode( earthTexture, earth );
00214 
00215         // mars
00216         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateMars );
00217         graph->addNode( translateMars, marsTexture );
00218         graph->addNode( marsTexture, mars );
00219 
00220         // jupiter
00221         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateJupiter );
00222         graph->addNode( translateJupiter, jupiterTexture );
00223         graph->addNode( jupiterTexture, jupiter );
00224 
00225         // saturn
00226         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateSaturn );
00227         graph->addNode( translateSaturn, saturnTexture );
00228         graph->addNode( saturnTexture, saturn );
00229 
00230         // uranus
00231         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateUranus );
00232         graph->addNode( translateUranus, uranusTexture );
00233         graph->addNode( uranusTexture, uranus );
00234 
00235         // neptune
00236         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translateNeptune );
00237         graph->addNode( translateNeptune, neptuneTexture );
00238         graph->addNode( neptuneTexture, neptune );
00239 
00240         // pluto
00241         graph->addNode( solarSystem, translatePluto );
00242         graph->addNode( translatePluto, plutoTexture );
00243         graph->addNode( plutoTexture, pluto );
00244 
00245         /*
00246         std::ofstream file("solar_system.dot");
00247         file << graph->getDotGraph();
00248         */
00249 
00250         graphRenderer.EnterMainLoop();
00251         
00252         return 0;
00253 }
